genesis.title: The Beginning
genesis.text: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth...

genesis.title: Adam & Eve
genesis.text: The Lord God formed a man from the dust...

exodus.title: Let My People Go
exodus.text: A new king arose over Egypt who did not know Joseph...

exodus.title: The Burning Bush
exodus.text: Moses saw that though the bush was on fire it did not burn up...

psalms.title: Blessed is the One
psalms.text: Blessed is the one who does not walk in step with the wicked...

psalms.title: The Lord is My Shepherd
psalms.text: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing...
